tasks.title: Set Up Project Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the project environment using Next.js and configure the necessary tools.
tasks.details: Use Next.js to set up the project. Configure TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and set up the initial project structure. Ensure the environment variables for OpenAI API and database connections are set up.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the environment setup by running a basic Next.js application and checking for successful build and deployment.

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project
subtasks.description: Set up a new Next.js project using the create-next-app command.
subtasks.details: Use the command 'npx create-next-app my-project' to initialize the Next.js application. Ensure that the project folder is created and the initial files are generated correctly.

subtasks.title: Configure TypeScript
subtasks.description: Add TypeScript support to the Next.js project.
subtasks.details: Install TypeScript and necessary types by running 'npm install --save-dev typescript @types/react @types/node'. Create a tsconfig.json file to configure TypeScript settings for the project.

subtasks.title: Set Up Tailwind CSS
subtasks.description: Integrate Tailwind CSS into the Next.js project for styling.
subtasks.details: Install Tailwind CSS by running 'npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer'. Create the configuration files using 'npx tailwindcss init -p' and configure the styles in the global CSS file.

subtasks.title: Create Initial Project Structure
subtasks.description: Establish the initial folder structure for components, pages, and styles.
subtasks.details: Organize the project by creating folders for components, pages, and styles. Ensure that the structure follows best practices for a Next.js application to facilitate future development.

subtasks.title: Set Up Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Configure environment variables for OpenAI API and database connections.
subtasks.details: Create a .env.local file in the root of the project to store sensitive information like API keys and database URLs. Ensure that these variables are correctly referenced in the application.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Develop the user authentication system using session-based authentication.
tasks.details: Create authentication endpoints using Next.js API routes. Implement login and logout functionality with bcrypt for password hashing and secure session management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test login and logout flows with valid and invalid credentials. Verify session creation and destruction.

subtasks.title: Create Authentication API Endpoints
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoints for user authentication including login and logout functionalities.
subtasks.details: Utilize Next.js API routes to create endpoints for user login and logout. Ensure that these endpoints handle requests and responses appropriately, returning relevant status codes and messages.

subtasks.title: Implement Password Hashing with Bcrypt
subtasks.description: Integrate bcrypt to securely hash user passwords during registration and authentication.
subtasks.details: Use bcrypt to hash passwords before storing them in the database. Implement the logic to compare hashed passwords during login to ensure security.

subtasks.title: Set Up Session Management
subtasks.description: Implement secure session management for user authentication using cookies.
subtasks.details: Configure session management to create and destroy user sessions upon login and logout. Ensure that session cookies are secure and HttpOnly to prevent XSS attacks.

subtasks.title: Test Authentication Flows
subtasks.description: Conduct tests on the login and logout functionalities to ensure they work as expected.
subtasks.details: Create test cases for valid and invalid login attempts, as well as logout functionality. Verify that sessions are created and destroyed correctly during these processes.

subtasks.title: Document Authentication System
subtasks.description: Create documentation for the user authentication system including API usage and session management details.
subtasks.details: Write comprehensive documentation that outlines how to use the authentication API, including examples of requests and responses, as well as session management practices.

tasks.title: Design and Implement Database Schema
tasks.description: Create the SQLite database schema for users, applications, label images, and audit logs.
tasks.details: Define the database schema based on the PRD specifications. Use better-sqlite3 for database interactions. Ensure all constraints and relationships are correctly implemented.
tasks.testStrategy: Run migration scripts and verify the schema using test data. Check for correct relationships and constraints.

subtasks.title: Define User Table Schema
subtasks.description: Create the schema for the users table, including fields for user ID, username, password hash, and timestamps for creation and updates.
subtasks.details: The users table will have columns: id (INTEGER PRIMARY KEY), username (TEXT UNIQUE), password_hash (TEXT), created_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), updated_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP).

subtasks.title: Define Applications Table Schema
subtasks.description: Design the schema for the applications table, which will store application details and link to the users table.
subtasks.details: The applications table will include columns: id (INTEGER PRIMARY KEY), user_id (INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY), app_name (TEXT), created_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), updated_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP). Ensure user_id references the users table.

subtasks.title: Define Label Images Table Schema
subtasks.description: Establish the schema for the label images table, which will store image metadata and link to the applications table.
subtasks.details: The label_images table will consist of columns: id (INTEGER PRIMARY KEY), app_id (INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY), image_url (TEXT), created_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), updated_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP). Ensure app_id references the applications table.

subtasks.title: Define Audit Logs Table Schema
subtasks.description: Create the schema for the audit logs table to track user actions and application changes.
subtasks.details: The audit_logs table will have columns: id (INTEGER PRIMARY KEY), user_id (INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY), action (TEXT), created_at (DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP). Ensure user_id references the users table.

subtasks.title: Implement Migration Scripts
subtasks.description: Write migration scripts to create the defined tables in the SQLite database using better-sqlite3.
subtasks.details: Use better-sqlite3 to implement migration scripts that create the users, applications, label_images, and audit_logs tables with the defined schemas. Ensure to handle errors during migration.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run migration scripts and verify the schema using test data. Check for correct relationships and constraints.

tasks.title: Develop Application Management API
tasks.description: Create API endpoints for managing applications, including creation, updating, and verification.
tasks.details: Implement RESTful API endpoints for application management. Ensure endpoints handle authentication and authorization correctly.
tasks.testStrategy: Use Postman or similar tools to test all API endpoints. Validate CRUD operations and permission checks.

subtasks.title: Design API Endpoints
subtasks.description: Create a detailed design document for the RESTful API endpoints required for application management.
subtasks.details: The design document should include endpoint paths, HTTP methods, request/response formats, and authentication requirements.

subtasks.title: Implement Application Creation Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoint for creating new applications, ensuring proper validation and error handling.
subtasks.details: This endpoint should accept application data, validate it, and store it in the database. Include authentication checks.

subtasks.title: Implement Application Update Endpoint
subtasks.description: Create the API endpoint for updating existing application details with appropriate validation.
subtasks.details: This endpoint should allow updates to application data, ensuring that only authorized users can make changes.

subtasks.title: Implement Application Verification Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop the API endpoint for verifying application details, including status checks and user permissions.
subtasks.details: This endpoint should check the application's current status and return verification results based on user permissions.

subtasks.title: Set Up Authentication and Authorization
subtasks.description: Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms for all API endpoints to ensure secure access.
subtasks.details: Utilize session-based authentication and ensure that all endpoints validate user permissions correctly before processing requests.

tasks.title: Integrate AI Verification Service
tasks.description: Integrate OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for label verification and data extraction.
tasks.details: Set up API calls to OpenAI for image processing. Implement logic to handle responses and store results in the database.
tasks.testStrategy: Test AI integration with sample images. Verify correct data extraction and handling of AI responses.

subtasks.title: Set Up OpenAI API Integration
subtasks.description: Establish the initial API connection to OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini for label verification.
subtasks.details: Create a service file to manage API calls to OpenAI. Ensure that the API key is securely stored and accessible within the application.

subtasks.title: Implement Image Processing Logic
subtasks.description: Develop the logic to send images to the OpenAI API for processing and receive responses.
subtasks.details: Create functions to handle image uploads, send them to the OpenAI API, and process the responses for verification and data extraction.

subtasks.title: Store Results in Database
subtasks.description: Implement the functionality to store the results from the OpenAI API into the database.
subtasks.details: Create database models and functions to save the extracted data and verification results. Ensure proper error handling and data validation.

subtasks.title: Handle API Response Errors
subtasks.description: Develop error handling mechanisms for the API responses from OpenAI.
subtasks.details: Implement logic to manage different types of errors returned by the OpenAI API, including network issues and invalid responses.

subtasks.title: Test AI Integration with Sample Images
subtasks.description: Conduct tests to verify the integration of the AI service with sample images.
subtasks.details: Use a set of predefined sample images to test the entire flow from image upload to data extraction and storage. Validate the accuracy of the results.

tasks.title: Implement Frontend Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop the user dashboard for viewing and managing applications.
tasks.details: Use Next.js and React to build the dashboard interface. Implement filtering and batch processing features.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform UI testing to ensure all elements are functional and responsive. Validate filtering and batch actions.

subtasks.title: Set Up Next.js Project
subtasks.description: Initialize a new Next.js project for the frontend dashboard development.
subtasks.details: Create a new Next.js application using the command 'npx create-next-app'. Set up the project structure and install necessary dependencies like React and any UI libraries.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard Layout
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and implement the initial layout for the user dashboard.
subtasks.details: Design the dashboard layout using Figma or similar tools. Implement the layout in React components, ensuring responsiveness and accessibility.

subtasks.title: Implement Filtering Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the filtering feature to allow users to filter applications based on various criteria.
subtasks.details: Create a filtering component that interacts with the application data. Use state management to handle filter changes and update the displayed applications accordingly.

subtasks.title: Develop Batch Processing UI
subtasks.description: Implement the user interface for batch processing of applications.
subtasks.details: Create UI components that allow users to select multiple applications and trigger batch processing actions. Ensure that the UI is intuitive and user-friendly.

subtasks.title: Integrate API for Data Fetching
subtasks.description: Set up API calls to fetch application data for the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Implement API calls using Next.js API routes to retrieve application data from the backend. Ensure data is fetched efficiently and displayed correctly on the dashboard.

tasks.title: Develop Application Review Interface
tasks.description: Create the interface for reviewing and verifying application details.
tasks.details: Build the side-by-side comparison view for application verification. Implement color-coded indicators and action buttons.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the review interface with various application scenarios. Ensure accurate display of verification results.

subtasks.title: Design Side-by-Side Comparison Layout
subtasks.description: Create the layout for the side-by-side comparison view of application details.
subtasks.details: Utilize wireframing tools to design the layout, ensuring that both application versions are clearly visible. Include space for color-coded indicators and action buttons.

subtasks.title: Implement Color-Coded Indicators
subtasks.description: Develop the functionality for color-coded indicators to highlight differences in application details.
subtasks.details: Use CSS to create color-coded indicators that change based on the comparison results. Ensure that the colors are accessible and intuitive for users.

subtasks.title: Add Action Buttons for Verification
subtasks.description: Integrate action buttons that allow users to verify or reject application details.
subtasks.details: Implement buttons for 'Verify' and 'Reject' actions. Ensure that these buttons trigger appropriate events and update the application status accordingly.

subtasks.title: Develop Frontend Logic for Comparison
subtasks.description: Create the frontend logic to handle the comparison of application details and display results.
subtasks.details: Use React state management to handle the comparison logic. Ensure that the comparison results are dynamically updated based on user interactions.

subtasks.title: Test Review Interface Functionality
subtasks.description: Conduct testing on the review interface to ensure all components function as expected.
subtasks.details: Perform user testing with various application scenarios to validate the display of verification results and the functionality of action buttons.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the review interface with various application scenarios. Ensure accurate display of verification results.

tasks.title: Implement Batch Processing Logic
tasks.description: Develop logic for batch processing of applications with concurrent AI calls.
tasks.details: Implement batch processing using Promise.allSettled to handle up to 10 concurrent AI calls. Ensure efficient error handling and status updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Test batch processing with different batch sizes. Validate processing times and error handling.

subtasks.title: Set Up Batch Processing Framework
subtasks.description: Establish the foundational structure for batch processing logic using Promise.allSettled.
subtasks.details: Create a new module for batch processing that will utilize Promise.allSettled to manage multiple AI calls concurrently. This module should be designed to handle up to 10 concurrent requests efficiently.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling Mechanism
subtasks.description: Develop a robust error handling system for the batch processing logic.
subtasks.details: Integrate error handling within the batch processing framework to capture and log errors from AI calls. Ensure that errors do not halt the entire batch process and that each call's status is reported accurately.

subtasks.title: Create Status Update Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement functionality to update the status of each AI call in the batch processing.
subtasks.details: Develop a method to track and update the status of each AI call within the batch. This should include success, failure, and in-progress states, allowing for real-time monitoring of the batch process.

subtasks.title: Test Batch Processing with Sample Data
subtasks.description: Conduct tests on the batch processing logic using various sample data sets.
subtasks.details: Create test cases that simulate different batch sizes and scenarios, including both successful and failed AI calls. Validate that the batch processing logic handles these cases as expected and updates statuses correctly.

subtasks.title: Document Batch Processing Logic
subtasks.description: Write comprehensive documentation for the implemented batch processing logic.
subtasks.details: Prepare documentation that outlines the architecture, usage, and error handling of the batch processing logic. Include examples and best practices for future developers.

tasks.title: Build Audit Log System
tasks.description: Implement the audit log system to track user actions and application changes.
tasks.details: Create audit log entries for all critical actions. Ensure logs are stored securely and can be queried by admins.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify audit log entries for various user actions. Check log integrity and access permissions.

subtasks.title: Define Audit Log Entry Structure
subtasks.description: Create a detailed structure for audit log entries that includes necessary fields such as user ID, action type, timestamp, and any relevant metadata.
subtasks.details: The structure should be designed to capture all critical actions performed by users, ensuring that each entry is comprehensive and useful for tracking purposes.

subtasks.title: Implement Logging Mechanism
subtasks.description: Develop the functionality to log user actions and application changes into the audit log system.
subtasks.details: Utilize middleware to intercept user actions and log them according to the defined structure. Ensure that the logging mechanism is efficient and does not impact application performance.

subtasks.title: Secure Log Storage
subtasks.description: Ensure that the audit logs are stored securely to prevent unauthorized access and tampering.
subtasks.details: Implement encryption for log entries and restrict access to the logs based on user roles. Use secure storage solutions to maintain log integrity.

subtasks.title: Create Admin Query Interface
subtasks.description: Develop an interface for admins to query and view audit logs based on various filters such as date range, user ID, and action type.
subtasks.details: The interface should be user-friendly and allow for efficient searching and filtering of log entries. Implement pagination for large datasets.

subtasks.title: Test Audit Log Functionality
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of the audit log system to ensure all components work as intended and meet security requirements.
subtasks.details: Perform unit tests on the logging mechanism, security checks on log storage, and functional tests on the admin query interface. Validate that all logs are correctly recorded and retrievable.

tasks.title: Conduct Performance and Usability Testing
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing to ensure performance targets and usability requirements are met.
tasks.details: Conduct load testing to verify performance metrics. Perform usability testing with stakeholders to ensure the interface meets user needs.
tasks.testStrategy: Use tools like JMeter for performance testing. Gather feedback from stakeholders and iterate on UI improvements.

subtasks.title: Conduct Load Testing
subtasks.description: Perform load testing using JMeter to evaluate the application's performance under various conditions.
subtasks.details: Set up JMeter with appropriate test scenarios to simulate user load. Measure response times, throughput, and resource utilization during peak loads.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use JMeter to create load test scripts and analyze performance metrics.

subtasks.title: Gather Usability Feedback from Stakeholders
subtasks.description: Conduct usability testing sessions with stakeholders to gather feedback on the user interface.
subtasks.details: Organize testing sessions with selected stakeholders. Use structured questionnaires to capture their feedback on usability aspects.
subtasks.testStrategy: Record sessions and analyze feedback for common usability issues.

subtasks.title: Analyze Load Testing Results
subtasks.description: Review and analyze the results from the load testing to identify performance bottlenecks.
subtasks.details: Compile the results from JMeter and identify areas where performance does not meet targets. Document findings for further action.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create a report summarizing the load testing results and recommendations.

subtasks.title: Implement UI Improvements Based on Feedback
subtasks.description: Make necessary adjustments to the user interface based on the feedback received from usability testing.
subtasks.details: Prioritize feedback and implement changes to the UI. Ensure that the improvements enhance user experience as per stakeholder suggestions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct a follow-up usability test to validate the effectiveness of the implemented changes.

subtasks.title: Finalize Performance and Usability Testing Report
subtasks.description: Compile a comprehensive report detailing the performance and usability testing outcomes and recommendations.
subtasks.details: Create a final report that includes load testing results, usability feedback, and proposed improvements. Share the report with stakeholders for review.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the report with the team and stakeholders to ensure all aspects are covered.
